t: FOUNDRY - Foundry - Amazon.com Music
s: FOUNDRY is an American Hard Rock Band from Las Vegas featuring Kelly Keeling (vocals), Marc Brattin (drums) & James Fucci (guitar) w/Guest Artists Scott Griffin (bass) & Stoney Curtis (guitar). Their self-titled debut album released by band's own label Foundry Records.
